title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Change (1 point maximum)

  • Reaction rate slows/levels off.

Explanation of change (1 point maximum)

  • Rate slows as substrate concentration declines (substrate used)

  • Enzyme inactive by about 40 minutes - enzyme loses activity over time (labile enzyme).

  • Product inhibition.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

  • Enzyme inactive by about 40 minutes - enzyme loses activity over time (labile enzyme).

  • Product inhibition.

Student response earns one of the available points.

Student response earns two of the available points.
